teaser: Host Tess Vigeland visits one Los Angeles neighborhood, where the impact of the foreclosure crisis is more than just financial. Plus, seven years after Hurricane Katrina, a jazz musician reflects on life after losing everything. And New Orleans native Wendell Pierce -- you may still call him "The Bunk" -- updates us on his dreams of a Big Easy grocery store.
description: Host Tess Vigeland visits one Los Angeles neighborhood, where the impact of the foreclosure crisis is more than just financial. And New Orleans native Wendell Pierce -- you may still call him "The Bunk" -- updates us on his dreams of a Big Easy grocery store.
title: Marketplace Money for Friday, August 17, 2012
byline: Tess Vigeland, Judy Muller, Bob Moon, Millicent Jefferson, Kate Archer Kent and Michael Harris
